title: Fix meditation page slider behavior, restore back button, and match button dimensions

requirements.text: Fix the time control slider in the meditation page so that dragging right increases the time value and dragging left decreases it (normal slider behavior)

quotes: Visually the time control input which is in container in meditation page, still behaves in reverse order when I as a user drag to right, it drags itself to left

acceptanceCriteria: Dragging the slider handle to the right increases the displayed time value
Dragging the slider handle to the left decreases the displayed time value
The slider behaves consistently with standard slider controls

requirements.text: Restore the back button in the meditation page to be visible in the same position as it appears in the pre-meditation page, maintaining the same styling and behavior

quotes: And re-add the back button in meditation page, as it was completely removed
In the same spot it is positioned as in pre-meditation page, and this back button should be same pretty much, not new

acceptanceCriteria: Back button is visible in the meditation page
Back button appears in the same position as in the pre-meditation page
Back button styling matches the pre-meditation page back button
Back button functions correctly to navigate back

requirements.text: In the pre-meditation page, make the 'Begin Meditation' button match the exact height and width dimensions of the 'Save Ritual' button

quotes: And in pre-meditation page, do not change anything else, except make save ritual button same size in height and width as its next button
Yes, match exact dimension, close button I am referring to is 'Begin Meditation'

acceptanceCriteria: 'Begin Meditation' button has the same height as the 'Save Ritual' button
'Begin Meditation' button has the same width as the 'Save Ritual' button
No other changes are made to the pre-meditation page

constraints: Do not modify any functionality beyond the three specific fixes requested
Preserve all existing meditation page features and components
Do not change the pre-meditation page layout or other elements besides button sizing
nonGoals: Adding new features to the meditation or pre-meditation pages
Changing button styling beyond dimension matching
